name: Derelict (Aardvark Software)
overview: For Wealth and Glory, you have to ransack a thousand year old space ship. You'll have to learn to speak their language and operate the machinery they left behind. The hardest problem of all is to live through it. Derelict is a text-adventure in which the player's space ship is caught in a tractor beam and placed inside a space station. It's up to the player to find the required items to be able to escape again. Like with other text-adventures the player can move around through different areas, examine, take and use various items. There are also hazards that can kill the player.
